Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Awesome please with an awesome food on a reasonable price!

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Beyond the incredible food and service, they treat you like family. My wife and I came to Amsterdam to round out our honeymoon trip and the next time we return, we will be sure to visit Pizzeria Portofino to recreate our great memories.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Great food with nice outdoor seats

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Nice little place, I had a calazone pizza which was pretty good, my wife had Salmon and my daughter had the sea bass which was all well cooked. Tbe service we received was also good.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: This is NOT an Italian restaurant. They can‚Äôt even spell Portofino correctly. The service is bad, some staff is downright rude. Tables and deck outside are filthy. Food is low quality. If you want a bad taste of how Egyptians take on Italian dishes, this is your place.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Had pizzas but I wasn't impressed. Didn't even finish. The main issue is the dough, I like it thin and crisp

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Ordered Carpaccio...it came out mostly frozen and watery. To top it off...powdered parmesan cheese. This place obviously relies on its location instead of food to bring in customers.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Very FRIENDLY and surprisingly tasty pizza for the cheap price.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: The service was terrible, not only we sat in front of a waiter who ignored us for 10 minutes. When it was time to go, we paid the bill and he pointed at the credit card and said "Tip Tip Tip". I was shocked. A  tourist trap. But complements to the chief who made a delicious pizza.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: More than pizza, a well positioned restaurant with a broad selection of all your Italian favourites, and reasonable prices

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: This pizza is to die for! Just happened to pass by and saw the pizza being served and I had to stop in! And I am so glad I did! The service was brilliant and the pizzas were perfect and out very fast even though it was a busy summer months. ‚Ä¶

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: very nice and kind people, I love that you can sit near the water and the food is also very delicious!

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Very tasty and *real* Italian food! It's cozy and well-cleaned compared to what you'd expect. The staff are very friendly and happy. And the price is good. üëç

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Ambiance ok, brisk service. However, portions can be small, waiter said he didn't have any tap water when I asked for some, and when paying the bill he refused to give me the change (of 4 euros) telling me that this was for him!? ‚Ä¶

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text:
Visited this place 16th September 2016
Food was ok, but I have never come across such rude and abrupt staff in all my life. ‚Ä¶

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Stopped here as close to our hotel although my food was ok, Raviolli type dish (can't remember the exact name),  my wife's Spaghetti Bolognese was really watery and the waiter seemed to just want us out as quickly as possible. Almost like he wanted to close early. Definitely give this place a miss.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Pollo is a great waiter.  Great service.  Very cozy place by the canal and bridge.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Indoors the place has a weird smell. If you order coke you get black sugary water on tap, almost without gas. I mentioned it to the waiter and it became obvious he hates his job and blames customers. The food arrived late and did improve the first impression a little.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text:
AVOID!!!

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Decent prices and food, but service was not so great. Rude waiter. They would't even show us the desert menu, after asking around 4 times.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: The pasta was overcooked and had no taste at all. They tried to cover it by puting way to much pepperoni. Service isn't good neither! The only positive is that they serve beer üòÑ

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: The food was tasty, the personal is very friendly and prices are ok, especially for Amsterdam. I would definitely recommend the restaurant.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Friendly people obviously family run. Very fresh food and gorgeously tasty. Great value for money well worth it. Good location not right on busy car fumed road but overlooking canal.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Food was horrible for all 3 people in my party, service was very lacking as well as all 3 wait staff were clearly intoxicated. Far better choices available within a couple of minutes from here

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: We didn't leave Pizzaria Portofino as happy as we entered. Watch out: the portions are way too small to be called a full meal. The pizza's are a bit tasteless and the lasagne is about the size of a donut. The prices are high (a glass of coca cola for 3,5 euro) and we couldn't split the bill. I wouldn't recommend this place to anyone.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Don't go here. Very unfriendly to customers.. You get ripped of your money and the quality is disgusting. The man who received our order was on his phone all the time and he tried to make jokes... 4 Persons ate there and all of us were very unhappy.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Had an excellent pizza here during a day trip to Amsterdam. I‚Äôd go as far to say, one of the best. Excellent service too.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Unfriendly staff, mediocre food, right after ordering food we were asked to pay in advance before receiving our plate. Would not recomend to anyone.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text:
Pizza was Bad.
Service was terrible. Forced us to eat our Pizza in 15 minutes and sneaked around us the whole Time. ‚Ä¶

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Imagine an Italian restaurant that doesn't bring pepper or parmesan to the table with your pasta unless you ask for it. Imagine an Itslian restaurant that doesn't bring bread, olive oil or balsamic before you get your food. The pasta is not inedible but it is nothing other than ordinary.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Good munchies-style food. I had the artichoke pizza. Like many places in town,  they do not take American Express #noamex.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Nothing special here. It's a tiny restaurant with okay food. My meal filled me up but it might have been slightly overpriced... but cheaper than some other places around. The staff aren't very talkative or friendly, but the guy wasn't rude either, so I can't complain.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Wouldn't go there again. Pasta was way overcooked, no grated cheese - had to ask for it.  Seriously, for an Italian restaurant which should cook decent meals, it was pathetic.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Service is terrible. Food not special at all. Pizza far from a real Napolitana pizza nor Roman. Try to avoid spending time and money at this place.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: 2018/04 2 Pizzas (Quatro formaggi and Calzione) and one Bolognese. Was average not too tasty or spicy, nothing special. Service was also average.

Name: Porto Fino
Review Text: Nice place.Superfriendly waiter/service. Located close to one of the "Grachten". Great Pizza and Pasta.
